name: Vemmio
0:
”Alexa, turn on lights”
”Alexa, is office window locked?”
”Alexa, what is the temperature of upstairs kitchen?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Using the Vemmio skill you will be able to control your connected devices like lights, switches, dimmers, outlets, thermostats, locks, sensors, and many more.

Visit http://vemmio.com/smart-home/ for more information on the skill and the supported devices.

Hardware requirements:
- Vemmio Home Hub
- Vemmio Home compatible devices

Getting started

To get started, enable the Vemmio skill in the Alexa app, link it to your Vemmio Home account, and ask Alexa to discover devices.
After the discovery process is done, you will see a list of devices, locations, and groups you can control.

Controlling devices: you can use device names to control individual devices:

Alexa, turn off bed lamp
Alexa, turn on ceiling fan
Alexa, lock front door

Controlling locations: you can use location names to control devices in individual locations:

Alexa, turn on bedroom devices
Alexa, turn off kitchen

Controlling groups: you can use group names to control devices in individual groups:

Alexa, turn on lights
Alexa, turn off power

You can even mix and match location names with locations or groups. You can adjust all names within the Vemmio Home app.

Visit http://vemmio.com for more information and contact us if you have any problems while using Vemmio skill or Vemmio Home app.
